job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: Title Software Engineer IltbrgtltbrgtLocation Remote in these states AZ CA CO FL GA ID IL IN MA MN MO NY PA RI SC TN TX ampamp WIltbrgtltbrgtIf youre looking to be at the forefront of disrupting the ecommerce industry wanting to make your mark and be continuously challenged to grow your time has comeltbrgtltbrgtShipBob is recognized as 1 on Crains 2020 Fast 50 list of the fastestgrowing companies in Chicago ampamp Built Ins best midsized companies to work for in Chicago With this growth we are looking for top talent to help us reach the next levelltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRole DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAs a Software Engineer 1 at ShipBob you will be working within a team writing software to support the ShipBob missionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtShipBob is a tech enabled 3PL that partners with over 5200 ecommerce businesses to help them be more successful online We offer a full suite of fulfillment solutions for our merchants including the ability to improve their transit times shipping costs and deliver best in class experience to their customers With an almost 100 accuracy rate in fulfilling orders and orders shipped on time our merchants can count on us to deliver excellent serviceltbrgtltbrgtShipBobs growing fulfillment network is powered by our proprietary technology and acts as a back office for logistics providing merchants with full visibility into orders inventory levels in real time and access to advanced analytics over 27 integrations and data reportingltbrgtltbrgtAs one of the fastest growing tech companies in Chicago with over 330M raised from bluechip investors like Menlo Ventures Bain Capital Ventures Hyde Park Venture Partners and SoftBank Vision Fund 2 our goal is to continue to be the 1 best fulfillment technology in the industry To help us meet this standard we are scaling our entire team and looking for people who share our core values and have an entrepreneurial mindsetltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout YoultbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt ShipBob were looking to bring on board people who embody our core valuesltbrgtltulgtltligtBe MissionDriven We want team members that are passionate about helping entrepreneurs improve their business and bring that passion every dayltligtltligtBe Humble We have ambitious goals and our team members understand that success or failure depends on us working together and leaving egos at the doorltligtltligtBe Resilient Logistics is a complicated business So is software We value team members that never give up and keep iterating until a problem is solvedltligtltligt Be a Creative Problem Solver As a startup we value smart innovative solutions to complex problems We fall in love with the problem not our favorite solutionltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtFocus on growing as an engineer learning existing tools resources and processesltligtltligtDevelops their productivity skills by learning source control editors the build system and other tools as well as testing best practicesltligtltligtCapable of taking welldefined subtasks and completing these tasksltligtltligtDeveloping knowledge of a single component of our architectureltligtltligtDemonstrates they are a high energy individualltligtltligtEffective in communicating status to the teamltligtltligtExhibits ShipBobss core values focuses on understanding and living these valuesltligtltligtAccepts feedback graciously and learns from everything they doltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Bring To The Tableltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt13 Years of ExperienceltligtltligtExcellent problem solving skillsltligtltligtExcellent programming skillsltligtltligtExcellent communication skillsltligtltligtObject oriented mindsetltligtltligtAbility to work quickly and collaboratively in a fastpaced entrepreneurial environmentltbrgtltligtltulgtExperience In The FollowingltbrgtltulgtltligtSQLltligtltligtJSONltligtltligtRESTltligtltligtNetltbrgtltligtltulgtNice To HaveltbrgtltulgtltligtAbility to own small well scoped features and implementation of these featuresltligtltligtA defensive coding mindset with knowledge of OWASPltligtltligtA passion for QA and an understanding that testing is not someone elses responsibilityltligtltligtA passion for DevOps and an appreciation for continuous integrationdeploymentltligtltligtExperience with CltligtltligtExperience with ASPNET MVCltligtltligtExperience with Javascript fundamentalsltligtltligtExperience with Relational DB ConceptsltligtltligtExperience with AgileltligtltligtExperience with VuejsltligtltligtExperience with Azure DevOpsltligtltligtExperience with Azure FunctionsltbrgtltligtltulgtWe recognize that people come with a wealth of experience and talent beyond just the technical requirements of a job If your
